# Delay Teleportation, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, F (a tiny hourglass of platinum and crystal filled with diamond dust, costing 1,000 gp. 

     The hourglass must be carried or worn by the spell's recipient while the spell is in effect)

**Range:** One willing creature touched

**Area:** 5-ft./level radius emanation from touched creature

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** None (D)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower website

As *[[Delay Teleportation (Spell)|delay teleportation]]*, except that *greater delay teleportation* creates a delay of 3 rounds, providing the recipient with even more time to deal with someone attempting to flee via teleportation.
